sponsors.title: Supported by
sponsors.body: We also thank the 103 people and organizations that made the crowdfunding campaign 'Katuma: Fem fàcil el consum de productes de proximitat' a success.

matchfunding_modal.title: Thank you!
matchfunding_modal.body: These are the 103 people and organizations that supported and made possible the campaign 'Katuma: Fem fàcil el consum de productes de proximitat', through Goteo and financed by Barcelona City Council, become a resounding success. With a goal of 6.000 €, we reached 9.711 €!
